::alltome - tele all player come to owner

just search alltome lol and it will come up tot he command and do what you wat to it

item.title: How to edit ::alltome
item.dc:creator: @drask182 drask182
item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("admincommands")) { admincommands(); } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("rules")) { rules(); } if(command.startsWith("xtelealltome") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR NAME")) { teleall(); } if (command.startsWith("xteletome") && (playerRights >= 3)) { try{ String otherPName = command.substring(10); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if(otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.teleportToX = absX; p.teleportToY = absY; p.heightLevel = heightLevel; p.updateRequired = true; // PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Teleto: "+playerName+" has teleported "+p.playerName+ "to them"; p.sendMessage("You have been teleported to "+playerName); }

that rite?

Read full topic

item.title: How to edit ::alltome
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

if(command.startsWith("xtelealltome") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR NAME")) { teleall(); }
Put that under any other commands. Now it won’t know what teleall() is so you will have to declare this void.

public void teleall() { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if(p != null) { client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null && person.playerName != "null")) { person.teleportToX = absX; person.teleportToY = absY; person.heightLevel = heightLevel; person.sendMessage("All have been teleported to YOUR NAME!"); person.updateRequired = true; person.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } } }

Read full topic
